Text.Page:
I cannot figure out what's going on here. There's too much to keep track of.

I don't know what they're doing, but get rid of the {@LinkCreature:20#30143000#Lokian ebonweavers} and {@LinkCreature:20#30140000#Lokian blood mages}.

Whatever they're doing, it's nothing good. Bring back any research materials you find.

A journal, huh? Research processes and results? I'll send this to Arthgal right away. He'll want to get it off to Velika.

Good job getting this!
I hate not knowing what's going on. If you bring back the research materials, then I'll finally know!
